resources.string:
Architected and led a team to implement the new Android app from scratch to promote informal learning and knowledge sharing among professional network in enterprise and personalized social network using Retrofit, Dagger 2, ReactiveX/RxAndroid, SimpleContentProvider, Picasso, EventBus and etc.


Acted as Agile Kanban master and managed the Android team that included developer, manual and automation QA engineer.


Reviewed and merged pull requests on GitHub daily. Managed tasks in JIRA and continuous integration using Jenkins.


Came up with new QA process and enforced continuous QA to ensure the quality of the app in a daily basis.
